definitions: (of meat or fish) seasoned or marinated in a blend of chili, allspice, and other ingredients and barbecued over a wood fire

examples.text: the food was great, especially the jerked chicken and ribs

shortDefinitions: (of meat) seasoned or marinated and barbecued over wood fire

definitions: (of meat, especially beef) cured by being cut into long thin strips and dried.
shortDefinitions: (of meat) cut into thin strips and dried
